Rulings.Tengu:
●The owner of The Immortal of Thunder loses 5000 Life Points.
●If The Immortal of Thunder is destroyed while face-down, its owner does not lose 5000 Life Points.
●If your opponent takes control of your face-down The Immortal of Thunder and Flip Summons it, they gain 3000 Life Points. When it is sent to the GY, you lose 5000 Life Points.

Rulings.Cat:
● The owner of 'The Immortal of Thunder' loses 5000 LP.
● If 'The Immortal of Thunder' is destroyed while face-down, its owner does not lose 5000 LP.
● If your opponent takes control of your face-down 'The Immortal of Thunder' and Flip Summons it, they gain 3000 LP. When it is sent to the GY, you lose 5000 LP.

Rulings.Base: 1. The owner of "The Immortal of Thunder" loses 5000 Life Points.\n2. If "The Immortal of Thunder" is destroyed while face-down, its owner does not lose 5000 Life Points.\n3. If your opponent takes control of your face-down "The Immortal of Thunder" and Flip Summons it, they gain 3000 Life Points. When it is sent to the GY, you lose 5000 Life Points.
